definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: The velocity and desorption extent of mercury are enhanced with the increase of leaching time and quantity.
sentences.chinese: 土壤汞解吸量隨淋濾時間和淋濾量的增加而增大。

sentences.english: One may also adjust the conditions to monitor the desorption of adsorbate from the catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 也可以調節條件以檢測催化劑上吸附質的解吸。

sentences.english: The software for analysing the sorption and desorption isotherm of paddy was presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了所研製的稻穀吸附與解吸等溫線性能分析軟件。

sentences.english: High pH of lake water makes phosphorus to be desorbed from suspended particle.
sentences.chinese: 湖水鹼化促進水層中顆粒磷解吸成爲水溶性磷。

sentences.english: Enthalpy of desorption and adsorption process incr-eased as EMC decreased.
sentences.chinese: 同時，解吸和吸附過程中的焓隨含水率的下降而增加。

sentences.english: This is accomplished by using a thermocompressor to recycle regenerating steam through the absorber.
sentences.chinese: 它用熱壓機使再生蒸汽經吸附器循環完成解吸過程。

sentences.english: Field desorption mass spectrometry of some oligopeptides has been described in the present paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述了幾個寡肽的場解吸質譜。

sentences.english: The desorption kinetics of phosphorus from calcareous soil in china.
sentences.chinese: 磷在土壤中的解吸動力學。

sentences.english: They could thermally desorb these ions by heating the foil to red heat .
sentences.chinese: 他們通過加熱金屬箔至紅熱以解吸這些離子。

sentences.english: The lysine can be desorbed rapidly with ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 用氨水可將吸附的賴氨酸迅速解吸。

sentences.english: There was unobvious effect of temperature on the absorption of TCs in two soils.
sentences.chinese: 溫度對此類抗生素吸附解吸的影響並不明顯。

sentences.english: The results showed that the adsorption rate of adsorption resin was higher and adsorption resin was easier to be desorbed.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，吸附樹脂吸附率高，解吸容易。

sentences.english: The model can reflect the actual circumstances of methane desorption.
sentences.chinese: 模型能夠反映氣體解吸的真實情況。

sentences.english: Ethanol was highly concentrated in the former 2BV of regenerant washing water and can be recycled.
sentences.chinese: 解吸劑洗水中前2BV乙醇含量高，可回收乙醇。

sentences.english: Desorbed P was significantly correlated with soil available P and P uptake by Plant.
sentences.chinese: 解吸P量與土壤速效P和植物吸收P均有顯著相關。

definition: (chemistry) mass transfer (as observed in processes like evaporation, distillation and membrane filtration)
filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar
